T04D3980:258b-1: sapta am ga saddha rma ts'arya aa ba t'a ra /
T04D3980:258b-3: dam pa'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i yan lag bdun pa /
T04D3980:258b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3980:258b-5: sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags tshogs ni //
T04D3980:258b-6: skyabs mchog bden gnyis yongs bzung pas //
T04D3980:258b-7: shes rab snying rjes mnyam sbyor la //
T04D3980:258b-8: bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3980:258b-9: phyag btsal ba'i yan lag ste dang po'o //
T04D3980:258b-10: skyabs gsum bla med rin chen la //
T04D3980:258b-11: phyi nang kho na nyid don can //
T04D3980:258b-12: mchod sprin bsam mi khyab rnams kyis //
T04D3980:258b-13: legs par mchod pa'i tshogs mchod //
T04D3980:258b-14: mchod pa 'bul ba'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o //
T04D3980:259a-2: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T04D3980:259a-3: byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
T04D3980:259a-4: rtag tu gus pas skyabs su mchi //
T04D3980:259a-5: skyabs su 'gro ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o //
T04D3980:259a-6: bdag gis lus ngag yid sgo nas //
T04D3980:259a-7: mi bzad sdig pa gang bgyis dang //
T04D3980:259a-8: bgyid stsal rjes su yi rang gang //
T04D3980:259a-9: de dag thams cad so sor bshags //
T04D3980:259a-10: sdig pa bshags pa'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o //
T04D3980:259a-11: rdzogs sangs byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T04D3980:259a-12: rang rgyal rgyal ba'i slob ma dang //
T04D3980:259a-13: 'jig rten bsod nams gang bgyid la'ang //
T04D3980:259a-14: dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo //
T04D3980:259a-15: rjes su yi rang ba'i yan lag ste lnga pa'o //
T04D3980:259a-16: shes rab snying rje dang bcas pa'i //
T04D3980:259a-17: brtson pas sems can don du bdag //
T04D3980:259a-18: sangs rgyas mdun du gnas bgyis te //
T04D3980:259a-19: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyid //
T04D3980:259a-20: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i yan lag ste drug pa'o //
T04D3980:259a-21: bsod nams tshogs kyi chos 'di dag / byang chub gsum gyi rgyur gyur pa //
T04D3980:259a-22: bdag med gnyis kyi lam brten pas //
T04D3980:259a-23: mtho ris thar bsgrub gyur cig / bdag gi bsod nams gang bgyis bas //
T04D3980:259a-24: skye bos rgyal ba thob gyur te //
T04D3980:259a-25: gus pas sems can thams cad don //
T04D3980:259a-26: rgya chen yang dag byed gyur cig / bdag ni tshe rabs thams cad du //
T04D3980:259a-27: sangs rgyas mthong ba rnyed gyur cig / dam pa'i chos ni nyan pa dang //
T04D3980:259a-28: dge 'dun zhabs 'bring byed gyur cig / thabs mkhas yang dag bshes gnyen ldan //
T04D3980:259a-29: chos dang zang zing sbyin byed cing //
T04D3980:259a-30: longs spyod sems can thun mong dang //
T04D3980:259a-31: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs shog /'byor ba phul ba'i bsod nams dang //
T04D3980:259a-32: tshul khrims legs par gzung ba dang //
T04D3980:259a-33: dam chos yang dag mnyan pa yis //
T04D3980:259a-34: bdag ni byang chub mchog thob shog / bdag ni 'di nas shi 'phos tshe //
T04D3980:259a-35: dga' ldan skyes nas yid dge pas //
T04D3980:259a-36: myur du byams mgon bsnyen byas te //
T04D3980:259a-37: byang chub lung bstan rnyed par shog / smon lam gdab pa'i yan lag ste bdun pa'o //
T04D3980:259a-38: dam pa'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i yan lag bdun pa /
T04D3980:259a-39: kha che'i pandi ta chen po sh'akya shr'i bha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04D3980:259a-41: // / pandi ta chen po de nyid dang /
